definitions.definition: The shortest curve between two points on a specific surface .
A segment of a great circle .
A course allowing the parallel-transport of vectors along a course that causes tangent vectors to remain tangent vectors throughout that course ( a straight curve , a line that is straight ) .

main_definition: ( geometry ) The shortest curve between two points on a specific surface .
secondary_definitions: ( spherical geometry ) A segment of a great circle .

( mathematics , sciences ) A course allowing the parallel-transport of vectors along a course that causes tangent vectors to remain tangent vectors throughout that course ( a straight curve , a line that is straight ) .
